roleset.name: mode of motion
roleset.note: WIGGLE-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3. (from wiggle.01-v)

example.name: not the flat-headed borer!
example.text: Some 500 insects and 150 diseases wiggle, chew and romp through growers' nightmares, including maggots, mites, mildew, thrips, black rot and the flat-headed borer.
example.arg: [0] including maggots, mites, mildew, thrips, black rot and the flat-headed borer

roleset.name: cause to wiggle
roleset.note: WIGGLE-V NOTES: Rolesets could be merged? VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls body_internal_motion-49, crane-40.3.2. (from wiggle.02-v)

example.name: wiggling fanny
example.text: ``She just wiggled her fanny and all the French fell in love with her,'' sniffed the literary world's Maria Jolas, not entirely inaccurately.
